// Actions and types
import*as t from"../types";var initialState={boxes:[]};export var farmReducer=function farmReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case t.FarmActionTypes.LOAD_BOXES:{return{boxes:action.payload};}default:{return state;}}};
